Description:
Touch Of Class
Built to perfection, this contemporary home has everything you need and more! Ideally located in a highly desirable Shearwater Estate, this beautifully presented property will delight the most fastidious buyers. Thoughtfully designed but created to impress, this fabulous near new home boasts quality inclusions blended with the effortless style and luxury of modern living.
3 bedrooms plus study and 2 separate living areas, the clever layout, both inside and out, ensures that there is a space for all the family. The main open plan living area is one of the many highlights of the home. The free flowing kitchen, dining and family area is perfect for large gatherings and the impeccably appointed kitchen. An additional separate lounge at the front of the home is perfect to enjoy the north sun through the windows all year round.
The fully landscaped backyard has been designed with low maintenance, easy living and enjoying life at the beach in mind.
Just minutes from schools and shops, Cowes Golf Club and Silverleaves beachfront, this sophisticated property is the answer for those seeking spacious contemporary modern living. So don't miss out on making this your new home. This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Island Getaway!
Located in the popular Ramada Resort in Cowes is this fabulous Villa situated on the northern most boundary of the complex and adjacent to farmland with a beautiful and peaceful rural aspect.
Offering a private and sunny north facing deck, this spacious two bedroom Villa presents an incredibly affordable opportunity for you to secure a weekend getaway for the family.
This fully furnished villa with light filled open plan living, kitchen and dining space, two bedrooms complete with built in robes, central bathroom with bath and European laundry, all come together to make this a care free getaway with nothing to do.
The lush native surrounds ensure a sense of calm and privacy whilst the main shopping precinct of Cowes and bay beach are just minutes away. Fabulous facilities within the resort are only a short walk and cater for all ages; includes three outdoor swimming pools, outdoor spa, indoor lap pool, tennis courts, cafe and bar, kids club, children's playground, conference centre, gymnasium and pizzeria.
Additional features include: dishwasher, gas heater, split system heating and cooling, two car spaces, storage cupboard, second outdoor area.
This property for sale in cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip island

Description:
Discover The Good Life Today!
Situated at the end of an exclusive private Cul De Sac and set within 1 Acre approx of lovely established grounds is this exceptionally presented family home.
Comprising three spacious living zones, four bedrooms all with walk-in-robes, home office and two bathrooms, with full ensuite that includes spa bath to the master.
Inside the home you will appreciate the quality fixtures and fittings that include ducted split system heating/ cooling throughout, floating floors, combustion heating, stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone bench tops and glass splash backs to the kitchen, high ceilings throughout and a surround sound system fitted to the living areas.
Additional features include an undercover solar heated pool complete with full bathroom that is attached to the home, double garage with direct access as well as a barn style shed/ workshop with two additional lock up car spaces. There is a huge undercover alfresco dining area complete with privacy blinds that links the home to the pool along with a north-facing sundeck.
You will never run out of water with a total of 50,000 litres in tank water. All within walking distance of Cowes beach and town centre, unique opportunities like these don't come by too often. Inspect by appointment only.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
WHEN LOCATION MATTERS
Situated in the highly sought after area of Silverleaves, this home is only a short walk from the popular Silverleaves Beach, and the Silverleaves Store & Café, while still being less than a 5 minute drive from central Cowes, and all of the amenities on offer there.
With high, 7 foot ceilings, wide hallways and extra large bedrooms, this home has old world charm with modern conveniences. There are 5 bedrooms, which includes a large master suite with ensuite, family bathroom with a large spa, large open plan living, dining and kitchen area that opens out through French doors to a large undercover deck. An open fireplace, as well as reverse cycle air conditioning, offers year round comfort.
Set on approx. an acre, this is the perfect sea change/tree change property.

Description:
Apartment Living Sure To Impress
** Ground floor directly opposite and overlooking the pool & spa
** Open plan living kitchen and dining
** Separate toilet & ensuite to master bedroom
** Moments from beach and shopping precinct...
Located on the ground floor directly opposite the pool area in the Phillip Island Apartment complex is this lovely apartment offering an open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The beautifully presented apartment features two good sized bedrooms, a bath with shower over, separate toilet and a second separate shower in the laundry, is stylishly decorated with gleaming timber floors throughout the living area, fully furnished and in an excellent location in central Cowes being only metres to the beach and shops. The apartment also includes a parking space for visitors and owners. This would make a fantastic weekender for those looking to relax, unwind and enjoy!
The apartment is currently managed by Phillip Island Apartments with a guaranteed return per month.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Delightful Cottage in Cowes
Set in a delightful garden this two bedroom cottage offers entry level into the market. Ideal as a permanent home or holiday cottage. North facing entertaining deck with an open plan living room and kitchen. Two double bedrooms and a renovated bathroom . The garden has a hothouse and extensive vegetable gardens with a low maintenance front garden of natives. Close proximity to Red Rocks Beach and everything this beautiful Island offers.

COSY BEACH SHACK
Nestled in the Red Rocks area in Cowes, this renovated property would make the ideal investment or beach house opportunity.
The open plan living/kitchen area features polished floor boards, modern kitchen with new appliances and plenty of room to move plus two generous sized bedrooms and central bathroom.
The house has been recently renovated and the design speaks for itself.
At the front of the property there is a private courtyard area, perfect for sitting by the Chimenea.
The property is fully fenced and comes with shedding at the rear of the property.
Inspections are sure to impress.

Description:
On a Grande scale!
Located in the popular Seagrove Estate this large 50sq approx double story brick residence property boasts luxury, comfort and grandness.
The owners have spared no detail when building this home. Originally built with holiday rental in mind, the home has been designed to cater for large families or groups, or would make a perfect permanent residence.
Situated on a large 678 sqm approx elevated allotment, with plenty of room for secure car, caravan or boat storage.
On the ground level you are greeted by a grand entrance hall - giving a true sense of the size of this home. This level offers a large master suite, complete with walk in robe, and ensuite, a theatre room (currently set up as a 6th bedroom). Also on the ground floor is a spacious living, kitchen and dining. The kitchen has been tastefully appointed with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. Situated just behind the kitchen is the functional laundry with plenty of storage. This living area opens up to the rear of the home to meet a large under cover alfresco area. Perfect for entertaining.
On the second level of the home, it offers a second master bedroom suite, complete with his and her walk in robes, ensuite and separate toilet. A second living area boasts a north facing balcony with lovely water views of Westernport Bay. A further three bedrooms all with built in robes, family bathroom, and a kitchenette with its own walk in pantry complete the floor.
The property also features; double garage with internal and rear access, split system heating and cooling to the downstairs living, ducted gas heating and cooling to both levels, electric ducted heating and cooling upstairs, quality timber laminate flooring, carpet and tiling throughout, ample storage solar hot water, water tank, and its very own golf putting green!!! The list goes on!
Don't miss your opportunity to secure this outstanding home, all withing walking distance from Thompson Avenue - school, shops, cafe's and restaurants, and a 10 minute stroll to the protected north facing Cowes foreshore.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Decked out to entertain
Set in a great position, only 500m from the Cowes foreshore, and 750m to the Anderson Road boat ramp, is this charming western red cedar home.
Privately nestled on a 604sqm (approx) fully fenced allotment, this home would be perfect for holiday or permanent living, with plenty of room for cars, boat and a caravan!
There is a large open plan kitchen, living and dining area, complete with a slow combustion fire - perfect for cozy winter afternoons. The living area opens out onto expansive decking area, ideal for entertaining and summer barbecues.
The home has 3 bedrooms, 2 offering built in robes, a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Also featuring:- high ceilings with exposed beams, single car carport, and low maintenance surrounds.
Arrange your inspection today - homes like this are selling fast!
This Cowes property is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
The Perfect Blend of Historic Charm and Seaside Holiday Living
Nestled in the heart of Cowes on a 654sqm approx. corner allotment within close proximity to the fabulous bay beach, café's, restaurants and shops. This exquisite family residence boasts majestic 14ft ceilings, beautiful Tasmanian Oak flooring and lovely period features.
Immerse yourself in this beautifully presented home comprising three bedrooms, including master with charming French doors leading out to a front north facing verandah, family bathroom and a spacious living room complete with gas wood fire heater and split system heating/cooling for all year round comfort. The functional kitchen/dining boasting with charms of yesteryear overlooks a secluded courtyard with a mediterranean style garden perfect for entertaining with family and friends.
At the rear of the home is a fabulous studio perfect for a home office/further accommodation. From the courtyard delightful leadlight Spanish doors open out to the rear of the block and to further shedding along with rear access to the property allowing ample room for boat/caravan storage.
Additional features include : kitchen servery, butlers pantry, newly renovated laundry, second separate bathroom with external access, outdoor shower, plantation shutters, dishwasher and quality carpets
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Excellent Location! Walk To Everything!
Situated in a quiet court and within walking distance to the Cowes shopping precinct and fabulous north facing bay beach is this beautifully presented contemporary home with spacious living areas and accommodation spread over two levels. The lower level features the main living, large kitchen and separate dining area, master bedroom, bathroom, laundry and an amazing covered outdoor space. The fabulous outdoor entertaining area has cafe blinds for all weather, year round use. The upper level comprises a further three bedrooms, two of which are huge, a second living area, a family bathroom including a corner spa and separate shower as well as a separate toilet.
The approx 311 square metre allotment has low maintenance surrounds and would be fabulous as a holiday home in this excellent location or as a permanent home. Additional features include two split systems heating/cooling, quality fixtures and fittings throughout including stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances to kitchen, beautiful timber flooring, garage, concrete driveway. The property is currently operating as a holiday rental with great returns.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White real Estate Phillip Island

The extra large kitchen and dining area add to the perfect entertaining area which just flows to the Alfresco area, this over looks the new in ground pool. Ideal for all generations and l can picture all three generations enjoying this property. The upgrades and extras must be inspected to be believed. With nothing to do just move in and enjoy.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME
This well maintained family home is situated in a quiet neighbourhood, conveniently located to Cowes shopping centre, and an easy stroll to a Cowes north facing bay beach and boat ramp.
The property is set on a double block and offers four bedrooms plus a study. Entering the home you are greeted by a large entry overlooking a sunken lounge with bay window.
Bi fold doors lead to the spacious kitchen/family room. The Tasmanian Oak kitchen has plenty of storage, large island bench, dishwasher and ceramic cooktop with wall oven. The large family/dining area has timber flooring and is great for entertaining with ample room for a pool table.
A spacious outdoor area is accessed from the family room and has part under cover with bistro blinds right around and also a bamboo decked area adjacent. The deck overlooks a low maintenance, fully fenced backyard with plenty of room for the kids.
The master bedroom suite includes large walk-in robe and spacious ensuite including spa bath, large shower and double Caesar stone vanities. The study is next door. The remaining three double bedrooms all with built in robes are situated at the other end of the house along with a newly refurbished family bathroom with large shower, separate toilet and laundry.
Other features include a large double garage adjoining the house at the front of the property, a separate area used as a home gym, 2 Kw solar system, instant gas hot water, ceiling fans, reverse cycle air conditioner in lounge.
The property also provides a boat/caravan garage, and another separate three bay garage at the rear of the property with two car spaces and a large workshop. The property has recently been repainted inside and out.
This property would make a perfect family home suitable for tradesman or someone needing extensive outdoor space.
Insights: 27 Chillingworth Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
When position is priority!
Conveniently located in the popular Blue Gum Estate is this recently refurbished family home that is sure to impress all buyers and would make for the perfect holiday or permanent residence.
Within an easy walking distance of the local supermarkets, Cowes Primary School, RSL, Doctors clinic and the Pristine Cowes Foreshore, you can't afford to miss this opportunity.
Comprising spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, three bedrooms, study nook and two bathrooms. The master is complete with a generous sized walk in robe that leads you to the modern ensuite with stunning subway tiles.
The well appointed kitchen is complimented by subway tiled splash backs and stainless steel appliances.
Offering a host of additional features including split system heating and cooling, combustion heating, vinyl plank and carpet floors throughout, single garage and a European laundry.
For those who love to entertain, there is a lovely private undercover north facing entertainment area which overlooks the established low maintenance rear yard.
Set within a 691 sqm approx fully fenced corner allotment with dual access onto the property and an additional side access/gate that is perfect for extra boat/caravan accommodation. All bases are covered with this truly lovely home.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
ELEGANT TOWNHOUSE IN IRRESISTIBLE LOCATION
This immaculately presented single level town house is light filled, spacious and convenient.
Like new throughout, the contemporary layout provides an open plan living/dining, modern kitchen, 3 enormous bedrooms (BIRs) master with en-suite and WIR.
Heating Cooling throughout the property can be zoned to specific areas. Only 700 metres to the beach and approximately 800 metres to the main street of Cowes, central location speaks for itself.
Highlights include a central outdoor entertainment area, single car garage with direct access to the home and walking distance to all that inner central Cowes has to offer.

Description:
Decked out to Entertain!
Ideally located within easy walking distance of the ever popular family friendly Red Rocks beach is this elevated weatherboard residence.
The merbau boardwalk leads you up the stairs to the home which comprises spacious open plan living, three bedrooms and one bathroom.
Additional features include cathedral ceilings with exposed beam throughout, reverse cycle heating/cooling, combustion heating, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, painted timber lined walls throughout along with marine ply floors to the living. If entertaining is your go, there is a full length undercover front verandah, along with a huge northfacing undercover entertainment deck at the rear. Out the back you will find man cave/ shed/studio offering you plenty of options.
There is a double carport under the home along with extra area which can be built in for further accommadation or living space.
All set within a 627m2 fully fenced allotment with low maintenance surrounds the home is ideal for permanent or holiday living.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
IDEAL BEACH HOUSE AND WEEKEND GETAWAY
Nestled away in a quiet court location in West Cowes, this property presents as the perfect weekend getaway.
Close to the north facing safety beaches of Cowes and only a stone’s throw from the main street of town.
Beautifully presented 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom house with separate toilet. All bedrooms have BIR’s and are of good size.
Split level design sees the open plan living and kitchen area lead out onto an elevated decking area that has a great vista over the well established garden.
There is a Coonara wood fire in the main living zone and ceiling fans for cooling. The property is fully fenced with an allotment of approximately 722m2.
The property comes with the potential of possibly enclosing the underneath of the existing design and creating another large usable living space/rooms.
Inspections will be sure to impress.
Insights: 42 Driftwood Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

The Kookaburra release features underground gas (LPG), recycled water, and super fast optic
fibre connections to the National Broadband Network.
Titles are anticipated in early 2018.
